import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; import myPhoto from './path-to-your-photo.jpg'; // Replace with your image path const About = () => { return (

About Me

I am Mridul Das, a learning Front End Designer and Back End Developer.

I also excel at Database Management and Tinkering.

I am trying to learn new things trying to always be my better self.

Education Qualifications

Completed 10th class from Prakash Vidyalaya, New Bacheli (ICSE)

Completed 12th class from Kendriya Vidyalaya, New Bacheli (CBSE)

Currently pursuing B.Tech from Gitam University, Visakhapatnam (CSE III Year)

); }; export default About;
